_sText:
Aim_shotty_hdr_v2 

V2 is a lot more open and more space to run around in.

Includes:
HDR-Full
HDR-Bloom (bloom looks the prettiest)

In the middle of this map is 5 grenades, just walk up a ramp and you'll pick one up.

Have Fun!!! :)

***HELP***
When i use full hdr the textures are a little foggy and seem to be missing bumpmaps. If anyone can tell me how to fix it, it would be very helpfull for my next hdr map.
